pages.title: Mujank
pages.content: Mujank is a fully-featured gacha game for using Discord's bot API with a website counterpart. It has multiple community-focused features such as card trading, and had hundreds of daily users while it ran from December to June 2022.

pages.title: Daily Rolling
pages.content: Mujank allows for daily card rolling, allowing users to choose to claim from multiple different rolls. Each card has a title, an average rating, and a description. Rolling uses Discord's embed feature and its recently released buttons feature.

pages.title: Community Focused
pages.content: Mujank has many community-focused features such as card trading and a store where you can buy specific rolls.

pages.title: Custom Database
pages.content: Mujank uses a custom NoSQL database solution to store user data, such as cards a user has in their deck and the amount of triplets the user has. Mujank is built in python and JavaScript, and was hosted 24/7 with 100% uptime on a Raspberry Pi 3B+.

pages.title: Website Counterpart
pages.content: Mujank has a website counterpart with features such as card look-up and bank/balance history. The Mujank website was built in JavaScript using Node.js.

footer.blurb: Check out my GitHub repository for Mujank!
